title: Hydralyte - Oral Electrolyte Powder On-the-go Clinical Hydration Formula for Hydralyte Drink (Orange 10 Count), Electrolyte Powder, Add to Water to Make an Oral Rehydration Solution
description: Access clinical hydration anytime, anywhere with Hydralyte’s clinically formulated oral electrolyte powder. This electrolyte powder creates an oral electrolyte solution that rapidly replaces the fluid and electrolytes in your body to relieve dehydration caused by vomiting, diarrhea, fever, or heavy sweating. Hydralyte oral electrolyte powder is available in two flavors: Orange and Berry.Each box contains 10 packets of powdered electrolytes. Just dissolve an electrolyte packet into 7 fl ounces of water to create a great tasting, clinical hydration solution.Hydralyte is a clinically formulated to contain the correct balance of glucose and electrolytes for the prevention and relief of dehydration. The formulation of Hydralyte’s electrolyte drink is based on the World Health Organization criteria for effective rehydration. Hydralyte works by replacing fluid and electrolytes lost due to vomiting, diarrhea, fever and heavy sweating
